price: Umutungo we n’urubyaro rwe nta cyo bizamumarira.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
